name: Scroll Velocity Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook that tracks the velocity of page scroll.

name: useIntersectionObserver Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook for observing element visibility changes.

name: useDebounce Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook to debounce a value, useful for inputs.

name: useLocalStorage Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook to sync state with the browser's local storage.

name: useMediaQuery Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook for tracking CSS media query matches.

name: useOnClickOutside Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook to detect clicks outside a specified element.

name: useCopyToClipboard Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook for copying text to the clipboard.

name: useWindowSize Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A hook to track the dimensions of the browser window.

name: useFetch Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A custom hook for making fetch API requests.

name: useToggle Hook
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A simple hook for toggling a boolean state.
